The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 December is 1,963,217 (3,487.9 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 22 December, there were 220,883 new confirmed cases (392.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 December, there were 148,626 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 49% (72,257 extra cases).
